title: Chemical [se]X 2: just one more
description: Taste the attraction. Again.One hundred percent delicious with zero calories, let yourself be tempted by our chocolate-infused delights. These bite-sized erotic treats are guaranteed to satisfy even the most discerning tastes.Best friends become more, beauty is tamed by the beast, a music festival turns erotic, strangers collide, shy lovers go wild, roommates break down barriers, and a chance encounter at a holiday party leads to sapphic delights.Something for every taste.Elevator shenanigans, mythic lovers, well-dressed hunks, hungry coworkers and birthday surprises, Chemical [se]X Volume Two delivers the goods.Are you ready for just one more?
author: Oleander Plume
